item.title: Log
item.description: Write log to both console and file consoleWriter := os.Stdout // os.Stderr w, err := os.OpenFile("./app.log", os.O_APPEND|os.O_CREATE|os.O_RDWR, os.ModeAppend|os.ModePerm) if err != nil { log.Fatal(err) } logWriter := io.MultiWriter(consoleWriter, w) l := log.New(logWriter, "--->", log.LstdFlags|log.Lshortfile) l.Println("this is a log")
